title: Skechers logo font or similar?
content:
Hi all,

Does anyone know what font is used for the logo? Also there seems to be a similar font used for the main menu on the [Skechers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203234/http:/www.skechers.com/) site.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203234im_/http:/typophile.com/files/skechers_logo_6426.gif)

Many thanks!  
Brennan
author: brennan

comments.content: Rifgt. And the top S looks like [Eurostile Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203234/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/eurostile/bold-extended-2-63893/) …
… slanted to get the same angle as serpentine.

Thanks Florian! Spot on. Also, thanks Renko for the input.

Cheers,  
Brennan
